title: Increase storage capacity for uploads

requirements.text: Increase stable_memory_reserve_mb in backend canister settings from 0 to 512 MB to support teacher profile images, student data records, review submissions with photos, and general file uploads (PDFs, documents)
acceptanceCriteria: Backend canister configured with stable_memory_reserve_mb set to 512
Image uploads for teacher profiles work without errors
Storage allocation supports multiple concurrent uploads

constraints: Preserve all existing gallery and image management functionality
Do not modify frontend upload interfaces
nonGoals: Adding new file types beyond what's already supported
